arts.ttl: Monaco beats Toulouse and is five points behind Ligue 1 leader PSG
arts.sum: Monaco got back to winning ways ahead of its trip to Arsenal in the Champions League after beating Toulouse 2-0 on Saturday and move within five points of the Ligue 1 lead. Goals from Wilfried Singo and Breel Embolo sealed Monaco’s ninth win in 14 French league matches.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 2-0 Toulouse: Monégasques close the gap to PSG
